content:
I am looking for a code to use as the category for an example action plan I am making for COPD (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease). A code similar to the codes found on this table:
http://argonaut.healthintersections.com.au/loinc/doco/?type=loinc&macode=LP175705-5

Appreciate advice on a coding that could be used for this.
